trans-unit.source: A column type for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control that contains a hyperlink for each item in the column.
trans-unit.target: 列类型<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>包含列中每个项的超链接控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the HyperLinkColumn column type in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control to create a hyperlink for each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>要创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>中的每一行的超链接控件</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>中使用 HyperLinkColumn 列类型

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A> property to specify the caption text for the hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A>属性指定的超链接的标题文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the URL to link to when the hyperlink is clicked, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要在单击超链接时将链接到的 URL，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A> properties, all hyperlinks in the column will share the same caption and URL.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A>属性，列中的所有超链接将共享相同的标题和 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the text caption and URL of the hyperlinks in the HyperLinkColumn to a field in a data source instead of setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以绑定的文本标题和超链接的 URL 中 HyperLinkColumn 到数据源而不是设置中的字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to display a different caption and to specify a different URL for each hyperlink in the column.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你以显示不同的标题以及指定列中的每个超链接的不同 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A> property to specify a field in a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>属性来指定数据源以绑定到列中的超链接的文本标题中的字段。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A> properties cannot both be set at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A>属性不能都设置在同一时间。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置这两个属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>属性优先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specify the field to bind to the URL of the hyperlink by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定要绑定到超链接的 URL 通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A> properties cannot both be set at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A>属性不能都设置在同一时间。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置这两个属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>属性优先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Target%2A> property allows you to specify the window or frame to display the Web page content linked to when the hyperlink is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Target%2A>属性允许你指定的窗口或框架显示时单击超链接，链接到网页内容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using data binding, you can format the text caption and URL of the hyperlink by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 使用数据绑定时，你可以通过设置格式的文本标题和超链接的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString%2A>属性，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[如何︰ 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[验证用户输入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the field from a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要绑定到中的超链接 URL 的数据源字段<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataNavigateUrlField property to specify the field from a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>.
trans-unit.target: DataNavigateUrlField 属性用于指定要绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>中的超链接 URL 的数据源中的字段

trans-unit.source: When the URL is data bound to a field, the URL of each hyperlink in the column is set with a corresponding value in the specified field.
trans-unit.target: 如果 URL 是数据绑定到一个字段，每个列中的超链接的 URL 替换相应的值设置指定字段中中。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to set a different URL for each hyperlink in the column.
trans-unit.target: 这样，你可以设置列中的每个超链接的不同 URL。

trans-unit.source: To specify the same URL for each row in the column, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定列中的每一行的同一个 URL，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A>而不是此属性的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DataNavigateUrlField and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A> properties cannot both be set at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> DataNavigateUrlField 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A>属性不能都设置在同一时间。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the DataNavigateUrlField property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置这两个属性，DataNavigateUrlField 属性优先。

trans-unit.source: When you are using data binding, you can specify a custom display format for the URL of the hyperlinks by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当使用数据绑定时，你可以指定的自定义显示格式的 url 超链接通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The field from a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 从数据源以绑定到的 URL 中的超链接字段<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display format for the URL of the hyperlinks in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"></xref> when the URL is data-bound to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示格式中的超链接 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"> </xref>时 URL 被数据绑定到数据源中的字段。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataNavigateUrlFormatString property to provide a custom display format for the URL of the hyperlinks in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataNavigateUrlFormatString 属性来为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>中的超链接 URL 提供的自定义显示格式

trans-unit.source: The specified format is only applied to the URL when the URL is data-bound to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: 指定的格式是仅时应用到 URL 的 URL 被数据绑定到数据源中的字段。

trans-unit.source: Specify the field to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the column by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定要通过设置绑定到列中的超链接 URL 的字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the syntax of formatting strings, see <xref:System.String.Format%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 格式设置字符串的语法的信息，请参阅<xref:System.String.Format%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.String.Format%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The string that specifies the display format for the URL of the hyperlinks in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"></xref> when the URL is data-bound to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: 中的超链接的 url 中指定的显示格式的字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"></xref>时 URL 被数据绑定到数据源中的字段。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the field from a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该字段从数据源以绑定到中的超链接的文本标题<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataTextField property to specify the field name from a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>.
trans-unit.target: DataTextField 属性用于指定要绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>中的超链接的文本标题的数据源的字段名称

trans-unit.source: When the text caption is data bound to a field, the text caption of each hyperlink in the column is set with a corresponding value in the specified field.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定到一个字段的文本标题时，每个列中的超链接的文本标题与对应的值设置指定字段中中。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to set a different text caption for each hyperlink in the column.
trans-unit.target: 这样，你可以设置列中的每个超链接的不同的文本标题。

trans-unit.source: To specify the same text caption for each row in the column, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定每个行相同的文本标题列中，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A>而不是此属性的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DataTextField and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A> properties cannot both be set at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> DataTextField 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A>属性不能都设置在同一时间。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the DataTextField property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置这两个属性，DataTextField 属性优先。

trans-unit.source: When you using data binding, you can specify a custom display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用数据绑定，你可以自定义显示为指定格式的文本标题的超链接通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The field name from a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 从数据源以绑定到中的超链接的文本标题字段名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"></xref> column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中的超链接的文本标题的显示格式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn"></xref>列。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataTextFormatString property to provide a custom display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataTextFormatString 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>中的超链接的文本标题提供的自定义显示格式

trans-unit.source: The specified format is applied to the text caption only when the text caption is data bound to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: 仅当文本标题数据绑定到数据源中的字段时，指定的格式被应用于文本标题。

trans-unit.source: Specify the field to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定要绑定到列中的超链接的文本标题通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the syntax of formatting strings, see <xref:System.String.Format%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 格式设置字符串的语法的信息，请参阅<xref:System.String.Format%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.String.Format%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The string that specifies the display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column.
trans-unit.target: 指定列中的文本标题的超链接的显示格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Formats a data-bound URL using the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString*> property.
trans-unit.target: 格式使用指定的格式的数据绑定 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: Use the FormatDataNavigateUrlValue method to format a data-bound URL value with the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: FormatDataNavigateUrlValue 方法用于数据绑定 URL 值的格式设置与指定的格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data-bound URL to format.
trans-unit.target: 要格式化的数据绑定 URL。

trans-unit.source: The data-bound URL in the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString*> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的格式中的数据绑定 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: Formats a data-bound text caption using the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString*> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式的数据绑定文本标题设置格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: Use the FormatDataTextValue method to format a data-bound text caption value with the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: FormatDataTextValue 方法用于设置数据绑定文本标题值格式指定的格式与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data-bound URL to format.
trans-unit.target: 要格式化的数据绑定 URL。

trans-unit.source: The data-bound text caption in the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString*> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的格式的数据绑定文本标题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: Provides the base implementation to reset a column derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref> class to its initial state.
trans-unit.target: 提供基实现来派生自的列重置<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>为其初始状态的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the cell representing this column with the contained hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 初始化单元格表示此列具有包含超链接。

trans-unit.source: HyperLinks are created for all items in the DataGrid except the Header and Footer items.
trans-unit.target: 为页眉和页脚项目除外 DataGrid 中的所有项创建超链接。

trans-unit.source: The cell to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The type of item that the cell is part of.
trans-unit.target: 该单元格的一部分的项的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to link to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要时单击列中的超链接链接到的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the NavigateUrl property to specify the URL to link to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.
trans-unit.target: NavigateUrl 属性用于指定要时单击列中的超链接链接到的 URL。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When this property is set, all hyperlinks in the column share the same URL link.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 列中的所有超链接时设置此属性，共享相同的 URL 链接。

trans-unit.source: To provide a separate URL for each hyperlink in the column, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要为每个列中的超链接提供单独的 URL，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A> and NavigateUrl properties cannot both be set at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>和 NavigateUrl 属性不能都设置在同一时间。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置这两个属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>属性优先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataNavigateUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL to link to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击要在列中的超链接时，链接到的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame to display the Web page content that is linked to when the hyperlink in the column is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架将其显示时单击列中的超链接，链接到的网页内容。

trans-unit.source: Use the Target property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击要指定的框架或窗口，其中显示网页的目标属性链接到列中的超链接时使用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，单击列中的超链接后，刷新浏览器或具有焦点的窗口。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Target property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> Target 属性呈现为`target`属性。

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: `target`属性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许的元素。

trans-unit.source: Do not set the Target property if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn> must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置目标属性的呈现的输出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>必须符合 XHTML 1.1。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>

trans-unit.source: For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅主题[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > > When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the Target property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: >> 时创建可访问网页，强烈建议你避免使用的目标属性将另一个窗口作为目标。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。

trans-unit.source: The Target value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore.
trans-unit.target: 目标值必须以中范围的 A 到 Z （区分大小写），以下划线开头的以下特殊值除外的字母开头。

trans-unit.source: |Target value|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported.
trans-unit.target: |目标值 |说明 | |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|呈现在新窗口中没有框架的内容。 | |`_parent`|呈现的即时框架集父代中的内容。 | |`_search`|呈现搜索窗格中的内容。 | |`_self`|呈现具有焦点的框架中的内容。 | |`_top`|呈现没有框架的完整窗口中的内容。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 检查你的浏览器文档以确定如果`_search`值受到支持。

trans-unit.source: For example, Internet Explorer 5.0 and above support the `_search` target value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Internet Explorer 5.0 和上面支持`_search`目标值。

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 目标窗口或帧以加载时单击列中的超链接，链接到的网页。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的框架的窗口。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption to display for the hyperlinks in the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示的列中的超链接的文本标题。

trans-unit.source: Use the Text property to specify the text caption to display for the hyperlinks in the column.
trans-unit.target: Text 属性用于指定要显示的列中的超链接的文本标题。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When this property is set, all hyperlinks in the column share the same text caption.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 列中的所有超链接时设置此属性，共享相同的文本标题。

trans-unit.source: To provide a separate text caption for each hyperlink in the column, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要为每个列中的超链接提供单独的文本标题，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A> and Text properties cannot both be set at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>和文本属性不能都设置在同一时间。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置这两个属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>属性优先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 不编码之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>中显示的 HTML 文本。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: 这使得可能要在文本中嵌入在 HTML 标记中的脚本。

trans-unit.source: If the values for this column come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果此列的值是来自用户输入，请务必验证这些值以减少安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text caption for the hyperlinks in the column.
trans-unit.target: 列中的超链接文本标题。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。
